newsitem.title: UK: LIFFE white sugar ends little changed.
newsitem.headline: LIFFE white sugar ends little changed.

text.p: LIFFE sugar ended barely changed on Thursday evening after a slow day.
Front-month August finished 10 cents firmer at $318.00 per tonne after trading between $316.60 and $318.80.
October ended down 20 cents at $307.50, its low for the day, after earlier touching $308.60.
Commission house sales balanced buying dominated by one broker team, with flat-price buying of August the main feature, traders said.
Chartists pegged good support in August at Thursday's low of $306.60.
In Paris, August finished 20 cents easier at $318.30.
